snippet.title: Auro: A Monster-Bumping Adventure Steam Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
After six years of development, the critically-acclaimed Auro is coming to Steam with an all-new and improved version.

Auro is a turn-based tactical dungeon crawler with procedural map generation that's all about bumping monsters into the water. It's nothing but strategy-gaming goodness - all bump, no grind!

The mobile version of the game has a 91% on Metacritic, with critics everywhere applauding Auro's endless depth, its lush, colorful pixel art, and its original gameplay. And now it's been massively improved in every way for the Steam version.

Learn more at www.auro-game.com.
Visit our site at www.dinofarmgames.com
Follow us on Twitter at @DinofarmGames
